text: Ara tini'i se satta; yini tamra rahamata brstira age bayu prabahita karena susambada hisebe [1], abasese yakhana seta bhari meghamala baye ane [2] takhana amara setake mrta janapadera dike caliye de'i, atahpara amara tara dbara brsti barsana kari [3], tarapara ta diye saba rakamera phala utpadana kari. Ebhabe'i amara mrtaderake bera karaba, yate tomara upadesa grahana kara
